sections.title: About Me
sections.body:
Keen, innovative and pragmatic programmer with 10+ years of experience in Java, system design, and cloud-native services.

I build secure identity platforms, reliable backend systems, and scalable integrations with a focus on low-toil operations and staged rollouts.
